assembly_info.submitter: GMGM

description.title: Microbacterium sp. Nx66 complete genome
description.comment: The Microbacterium sp. strain Nx66 was isolated from a water sample collected at Skikda’s El Saf-Saf valley in North Eastern Algeria. The sampling point was located near the estuary (36.87981N, 6.93111E) characterized by alkaline water and receiving industrial releases from a petrochemical refinery. The genome was assembled from MiSeq 2x250bp paired-end reads and ONT long reads.

bioprojects.title: Draft Genome of Microbacterium oxydans strain Sp951

assembly_info.submitter: UNIVERSITY OF COPENHAGEN, DEPARTMENT OF BIOLOGY

description.title: Draft Genome of Microbacterium oxydans strain Sp951
description.comment: Microbacterium oxydans is a soil bacterium isolated from an agricultural field in Denmark, showing synergistic interaction when grown in a four-species biofilm consortium. Here, we report the genome of M. oxydans with a size of 3,989,887 bp. DNA sequencing library was prepared using the NEBNext Quick DNA Sample prep. Master Mix 2 (New England Biolabs Inc., Ipswitch, MA, USA) according to the manufacturer’s protocol. The tagged library was sequenced as 250 bp paired end reads using the Illumina MiSeq platform (Illumina, San Diego, CA, USA).
